page.title: 16Leisure and Recreation
page.content: Most sunny days I go swimming in our pool.I enjoy swimming and diving and using the water to cool off.Each week we go out and hoover the pool to ensure that it is clean.We also have two caravans that we let in the summer so that the people can use the pool aswell. On a Thursday night I go to Newquay to the youth centre.People from Goonhavern,Newquay and St Column Major go aswell. We do Flora Dances at school and have to wear red dresses if you are a girl and white shorts and shirts if you are a boy.We also do Cornish and Folk dancing. We also do athletics which includes long jump,high jump,two hundred metres and other races.
